data.name: Ori and the Blind Forest (Additional Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
New tracks from Ori : Definitive Edition
- Music that was not released on the original soundtrack.
- Music from the 3 trailers that Moon Studios have released for the game.
- A selection of music that was unused or cut from the original game.
- A selection of music from the original Ori prototype.
data.about_the_game:
New tracks from Ori : Definitive Edition
- Music that was not released on the original soundtrack.
- Music from the 3 trailers that Moon Studios have released for the game.

- A selection of music from the original Ori prototype.
data.short_description: New tracks from Ori : Definitive Edition

fullgame.name: Ori and the Blind Forest: Definitive Edition

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 gig)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
